title: "Meta Partners with UK Startup Bodyswaps to Bring VR Learning to 100 Colleges and Universities"
excerpt: "UK virtual reality (VR) soft skills company Bodyswaps and Meta Immersive Learning have announced a partnership to give 100 colleges and universities across the U.K., U.S., Ireland, Canada, France, and Belgium access to VR hardware and software through $150 million in grants from Meta and Bodyswaps' full soft skills learning library."
